summary: This mod adds an additional level up music. The level up music is the same in a game called Silkroad Online. This does not replace the original Skyrim level up music. Instead, it adds a second music so it could play either one when you level up.
descriptionHtml:
A very simple mod.
This mod adds an additional level up music. The level up music is the same in a game called Silkroad Online. This does not replace the original Skyrim level up music. Instead, it adds a second music so it could play either one when you level up. So when you level up, there's a 50% chance it will play the SIlkroad Level UP music.

Update :
05 July 2018, added the full music replacer version.Â 

And for those that want to hear the level up sound, check out this video (not my video):
https://youtu.be/-W5ukk6wBIM?t=48s
author: Bronyphony
